title: Infinity Edge Tool Tip
body:
Instead of having the infinity edge tool tip saying "Unique: Critical strikes deal 250% damage instead of 200%." wouldn't it make more sense to say "Unique: Critical strike damage is increased by 50%." because in cases such as yas or shaco and their modified crits, it still does the 50% damage increase, it doesn't make them 250% (would be nice on yas, not so much for shaco) it just bumps the crit damage up by 50% of the base ad. So in reality, the tip shows that it only affects attacks that do 200% crit damage and isn't modified, when it still applies to modified damage, because for shaco q it would be more like 190/210/230 etc. not 200 to 250, by saying just 50%, it makes a whole lot more sense, because it then applies to everything universally, without debate.

So I propose that you change the {{item:3031}} tool tip to say "Unique: Critical strike damage is increased by 50%" instead of "Unique: Critical strikes deal 250% damage instead of 200%"

replies.body:
> Unique: Critical strikes deal 50% more damage.

See, the problem with that is that it would be inaccurate. After all, IE doesn't cause Critical Strikes to deal an additional 50% damage, it causes them to deal an additional 25% damage. To clarify, 50% is 25% of 200%.
Doesn't matter, it was changed, the infinity tool tip now says it
